title.rendered: “Exposing Hamas’ Terrorist Activities in Hospitals: An Exclusive Conversation with Gaza’s Health Ministry CEO”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

Recording of the conversation of the head of the Coordination and Liaison Administration for Gaza with the CEO of the Health Ministry in the Strip

“We see that the terrorist organization Hamas continues its military activity inside hospitals. We are ready to provide all the financial assistance required. Our request is simple, an immediate cessation of all terrorist activity in hospitals.”

The head of the Coordination and Liaison Administration for Gaza has been speaking in recent days with the CEO of the Health Ministry in the Gaza Strip about terrorist organization activity in hospitals and the need to thwart it, while fully coordinating with the hospital administrations.

Attached is a recording of the conversation: https://bit.ly/3IGKdSp
